name: Kill The Germs!
description:
Stop Them Before it's Too Late!
Germs infected the body and are spreading quickly. You are our only hope. Use your pills and power ups to get rid off them all, and heal the organism.

- Cool Power Ups
- Addicting Gameplay
- 45 Brain Teasing Levels
- Hours of Fun

Download this FREE game now and Kill The Germs!
